title: Andranik
summary: Andranik Ozanian,[upper-alpha 2] (Armenian: Անդրանիկ Օզանեան, commonly known as General Andranik[4][upper-alpha 3] or simply Andranik;[upper-alpha 4] 25 February 1865 – 31 August 1927),[upper-alpha 5] was an Armenian military commander and statesman, the best known fedayi[1][5][7] and a key figure of the Armenian national liberation movement.[8] From the late 19th century to the early 20th century, he was one of the main Armenian leaders of military efforts for the independence of Armenia.
